Eddy Higgins

Method Detail

extractOrderedMap

public static IOrderedMap extractOrderedMap(java.lang.Object record)
                                     throws RecordException
This method simply converts a record into an Ordered Map, probably just by casting it. If it cannot, then a RecordException will be thrown.

Parameters:
record - A candidate object which might be an ordered map
Returns:
the object as an ordered Map (probably just cast).
Throws:
NullRecordException - if the incoming record is null
RecordFormatException - if the incoming record is not an IOrderedMap
RecordException
